note: Photographer and artist from Lima OH All images at dansproul.com
Some words, mostly pictures. She/Her 🏳️‍⚧️

I'm a Dutch amateur photographer, Linux user, FOSS enthusiast and introvert.

I shoot what catches my eye and gravitate towards black and white renditions.

The majority of the images posted here are from my, most often rather early and sometimes rather long, morning walks.

Photos and edits are mine, AI free and have a CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 license. My images are shot with either a compact four thirds or a full frame camera.

I do prune my content on a semi-regular basis......

note:
London-born, now living in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

I'm a photographer and printmaker working with the traditional photographic processes of platinum-palladium and gelatin-silver printing, the contemporary polymer photogravure process, and the book-arts.

I offer traditional darkroom lab services and bookbinding, and I make portfolio cases for other photographers and artists too. I also teach workshops.
